chase.name: Chase Travel Portal
chase.bonus: 1.25x points with Sapphire Preferred, 1.5x with Sapphire Reserve
chase.tip: Book Hyatt through World of Hyatt directly for best points value

amex.name: Amex Travel
amex.bonus: 5x MR points on flights booked through Amex Travel with Platinum
amex.tip: Check FHR for luxury properties - includes breakfast and late checkout

capitalOne.name: Capital One Travel
capitalOne.bonus: Up to 10x on hotels with Venture X
capitalOne.tip: Great for price matching - book here if you find a good deal

citi.name: Citi ThankYou
citi.tip: Good for combining with Costco Travel deals

costcoTravel.name: Costco Travel
costcoTravel.tip: BEST for all-inclusive packages. Often includes extras not available elsewhere.

southwestVacations.name: Southwest Vacations
southwestVacations.tip: Great if flying from Midwest. No bag fees, free changes.

directFlights.note: Direct flights from Omaha (OMA) to Cancun seasonal

appleVacations.name: Apple Vacations
appleVacations.tip: Good for charter flights from smaller airports

expediaPackages.name: Expedia Bundle
expediaPackages.tip: Bundle flight+hotel for savings. Price match guarantee.

forMay2025.reason: Shoulder season rates lock in, before spring break surge

deadlines.note: Most resorts increase rates after President's Day
Last chance for early booking discounts

generalTips: Book 3-4 months ahead for best selection + price
Set price alerts on Google Flights
Check resort's direct booking perks (often resort credits)

hyatt.tip: Best value for Hyatt Ziva. Transfer Chase points for huge savings.

marriott.tip: Good for Dreams, Secrets, Now resorts. Off-peak pricing in May.

hilton.tip: Hilton Cancun and Tulum are solid redemptions.

fromDesMoines.tip: Book early - limited options from DSM

fromOmaha.tip: Check Southwest for seasonal direct flights

groupStrategy.recommendation: Book through one airline for easier coordination
groupStrategy.tip: Consider meeting in Dallas (DFW) - hub with most Cancun flights
